page_content:
Bramble Hub Limited

Bramble Hub DocuSign - CoSign Central

The strongest and most widely used digital signature solution in the world, ideal for all regulated and security minded organisations. Trust, integrity, and security across your business and IT environments, works with all apps and management solutions

Features

  • Standard Digital Signatures – PKI Sole Control over Credentials CENTS-419241
  • Management Security - NIST, FIPS, CC-EAL4+ certified
  • Directory Services integration / synchronisation such as AD and LDAP
  • PKI Aware for standards integration & Cryptographic Algorithms
  • Scalability, redundancy, high availability and high performance
  • Disaster recovery and secure backup
  • Certificate Authority Support, internal CA, subordinate CA or External
  • Auditing and Monitoring for Compliance
  • Signature API’s for SOAP, REST, JCE/JCA, .NET, Cryptographic, etc
  • Compliance with eIDAS, eSIGN, Common Criteria certified, FDA etc

Benefits

  • Legal compliance with industry regulations; eIDAS, FDA, ESIGN, UETA
  • Keeps signed content within your enterprise domain
  • Long-term proof of signer identity, intent and document integrity
  • Signatures can be validated by anyone, anywhere and at anytime
  • Allows users to sign wherever and whenever they need too
  • Adapts to your existing processes, governance policies and SOPs
  • Integrates into document/content management and workflow automation systems
  • Works with authoring apps, including Word, Excel, PDF/A, AutoCAD, etc
  • Significantly reduced paper-related costs with a rapid ROI/TCO
  • Deploys quickly with minimal operational impact

Pricing

£88 per user per year

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Year
  • Trial option available
